Structs/AppMetadata.html#/s:12AboutThisA.name: iconSize
Structs/AppMetadata.html#/s:12AboutThisA.abstract: The size of the icon. The default value is 80.

Structs/AppMetadata.html#/s:12AboutThisA.name: url
Structs/AppMetadata.html#/s:12AboutThisA.abstract: The app website url. The default is nil.

Structs/AppMetadata.html#/s:12AboutThisA.name: urlColor
Structs/AppMetadata.html#/s:12AboutThisA.abstract: The link color for the url. The default is .systemBlue.

Structs/AppMetadata.html#/s:12AboutThisA.name: init(icon:iconSize:name:versionText:altVersionText:url:urlColor:copyrightText:)
Structs/AppMetadata.html#/s:12AboutThisA.abstract: Creates a new AppMetadata instance with the specified values.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC12.name: shortVersionString
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC12.abstract: Returns version text using the info plist value

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC12.name: fullVersionString
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC12.abstract: Returns version and build text using the info plist value

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC12.name: appName
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC12.abstract: Returns the app name using the info plist value for the CFBundleName key, if it exists.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC12.name: copyright
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC12.abstract: Returns the copyright information using the info plist value

Classes/AboutThisAppViewController.html#.name: iconImageView
Classes/AboutThisAppViewController.html#.abstract: The image view containing the app icon.

Classes/AboutThisAppViewController.html#.name: versionButton
Classes/AboutThisAppViewController.html#.abstract: The button displaying the app version number.

Classes/AboutThisAppViewController.html#.name: copyrightLabel
Classes/AboutThisAppViewController.html#.abstract: The label displaying the app copyright text.

Classes/AboutThisAppPanel.html.name: AboutThisAppPanel
Classes/AboutThisAppPanel.html.abstract: A panel to display the “AboutThisApp” view controller.

Classes/AboutThisAppViewController.html.name: AboutThisAppViewController
Classes/AboutThisAppViewController.html.abstract: The view controller that contains the “About this app” view.
